articles.content: STRONGER TIES. Ambassador of Singapore H.E. Gerard Ho pays courtesy call to Philippine President-Elect Bongbong Marcos at BBM headquarters in Mandaluyong City on Monday (May 30, 2022). Ho and three o… [+4026 chars]

articles.title: Latest Russia and Ukraine News - The New York Times
articles.description: As his military announced a counteroffensive around the southern port city of Kherson, President Volodymyr Zelensky made a rare visit to frontline positions. European leaders are gathering in Brussels on Monday for a two-day summit on Ukraine.

articles.title: Leinster's Josh van der Flier wins European rugby player of the year award - The42
